alert.note: Alert for Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 3:59PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hidalgo and southwestern Willacy Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Midway North, or over Donna, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Edinburg, Weslaco, San Juan, Alamo, Donna, Mercedes, Elsa, Progreso, Edcouch and La Villa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
